name: Agile Shield Grip
summary: You change your grip on the shield, allowing you to combine rapid attacks with your shield boss or shield spikes and your main weapon's Strikes in a series of swift motions.

name: Combat Assessment
summary: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

name: Double Slice
summary: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

name: Everstand Stance
summary: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

name: Exacting Strike
summary: You make a controlled follow-up attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

name: Point Blank Stance
summary: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

name: Reactive Shield
summary: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

name: Snagging Strike
summary: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

name: Sudden Charge
summary: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

name: Vicious Swing
summary: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

name: Aggressive Block
summary: You push back as you block, knocking your foe away or off balance.

name: Assisting Shot
summary: Using your last shot to gauge your accuracy, you can fire off a quick shot to interfere with a foe in combat.

name: Blade Brake
summary: You plow your weapon into a floor, wall, or another sturdy surface, anchoring yourself in place.

name: Brutish Shove
summary: Using the momentum of your last attack to throw your weight into another, you make your opponent stumble back.

name: Combat Grab
summary: Using your prior attack to shift your opponentâ€™s guard, you take another swing and grab them.

name: Devoted Guardian
summary: You adopt a wide stance, ready to defend both yourself and your chosen ward.

name: Dragging Strike
summary: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
summary: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

name: Intimidating Strike
summary: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

name: Lightning Swap
summary: You have practiced quickly switching between combat styles and the equipment needed for them.

name: Lunge
summary: You attack an enemy at the edge of your reach.

name: Rebounding Toss
summary: You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another.

name: Sleek Reposition
summary: While your opponent is still recovering from your prior attack, you snag its armor, clothing, or flesh to move it as you please.

name: United Assault
summary: Through countless battles, you've learned you're stronger when working alongside your allies.

name: Barreling Charge
summary: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

name: Double Shot
summary: You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession.

name: Dual-Handed Assault
summary: You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

name: Everstand Strike
summary: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; trained in medium armor
summary: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Inured to Alchemy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs.

name: Knock Sense
summary: You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own.

name: Parting Shot
summary: You jump back and make a quick shot that catches your opponent by surprise.

name: Powerful Shove
summary: You can push larger foes around with your attack.

name: Quick Reversal
summary: You turn your foesâ€™ flanking against them with a quick reverse.

name: Shielded Stride
summary: When your shield is up, your enemiesâ€™ blows canâ€™t touch you.

name: Slam Down
summary: You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

name: Swipe
summary: You make a wide, arcing swing.

name: Twin Parry
summary: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

name: Advanced Weapon Training
summary: Youâ€™ve studied the art of wielding an advanced weapon.

name: Advantageous Assault
summary: After compromising your enemyâ€™s movement, you deliver a more deadly blow.

name: Dazing Blow
summary: You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them.

name: Disarming Stance
summary: You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

name: Furious Focus
summary: Youâ€™ve learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
summary: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack.

name: Pain Tolerance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you clumsy, drained, or enfeebled.

name: Reflexive Shield
summary: You can use your shield to fend off explosions and the like.

name: Revealing Stab
summary: You drive your piercing weapon into an imperceptible foe, revealing its location to your allies.

name: Ricochet Stance (Fighter)
summary: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Shatter Defenses
summary: Your offense exploits your enemyâ€™s fear.

name: Shield Wall
summary: You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade.

name: Shield Warden
prerequisite: [Champion] divine ally (shield); [Champion] tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
summary: When you have a shield raised, you can use your Shield Block reaction when an attack is made against an ally adjacent to you.

name: Triple Shot
summary: You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

name: Blind-Fight
summary: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Disorienting Opening
summary: You use your foesâ€™ openings to expose even greater weaknesses.

name: Dueling Riposte
summary: You elegantly counterattack against your flailing enemy.

name: Felling Strike
summary: Your attack can ground an airborne foe.

name: Impassable Wall Stance
summary: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

name: Incredible Aim
summary: By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true.

name: Knight's Retaliation
summary: You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe.

name: Mobile Shot Stance
summary: Your shots become nimble and deadly.

name: Positioning Assault
summary: With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position.

name: Quick Shield Block
summary: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

name: Resounding Bravery
summary: Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

name: Sudden Leap
summary: You make an impressive leap and swing while you soar.

name: Agile Grace
summary: Your graceful moves with agile weapons are beyond compare.

name: Certain Strike
summary: Even when you donâ€™t hit squarely, you can still score a glancing blow.

name: Crashing Slam
summary: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

name: Cut from the Air
summary: You can knock aside ranged attacks.

name: Dazzling Display
summary: You perform a bewildering show of prowess, such as by whirling and flashing a weapon, that unnerves foes.

name: Debilitating Shot
summary: Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

name: Disarming Twist
summary: After your initial attack redirects your foeâ€™s defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

name: Disruptive Stance
summary: The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and youâ€™re prepared to foil enemiesâ€™ actions.

name: Fearsome Brute
summary: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Flinging Charge
summary: You throw a weapon to distract your opponent as you close the gap to begin your assault.

name: Mirror Shield
summary: You reflect the spell back against its caster.

name: Overpowering Charge
summary: You trample foes as you charge past.

name: Tactical Reflexes
summary: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings.

name: Twin Riposte
summary: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

name: Brutal Finish
summary: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foeâ€™s defenses.

name: Dashing Strike
summary: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
summary: Using a free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Flinging Shove
summary: Whether youâ€™re shoving opponents with a shield or a large weapon, youâ€™ve learned to push them even further.

name: Improved Dueling Riposte
summary: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the slightest opening or moment of weakness presents itself.

name: Incredible Ricochet
summary: After your first shot singles out your opponentâ€™s position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

name: Lunging Stance
summary: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

name: Paragon's Guard
summary: Once youâ€™ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

name: Desperate Finisher
summary: You throw everything you have into one last, reckless press.

name: Determination
summary: Your training allows you to shrug off your foesâ€™ spells and conditions when the need is dire.

name: Guiding Finish
summary: Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

name: Guiding Riposte
summary: By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
summary: Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

name: Opening Stance (Fighter)
summary: At the first sign of trouble, often before you consciously realize the danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought.

name: Two-Weapon Flurry
summary: Using the momentum of your prior attack, you lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy.

name: Whirlwind Strike
summary: You lash out in a blur of motion, attacking all nearby adversaries.

name: Graceful Poise
summary: With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpionâ€™s stinger.

name: Improved Reflexive Shield
summary: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

name: Master of Many Styles
summary: You move fluidly between stances, using your mastery of combat to always adopt the best tactics.

name: Multishot Stance
summary: You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

name: Overwhelming Blow
summary: You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
summary: Youâ€™re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Impossible Volley
summary: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

name: Savage Critical
summary: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

name: Smash from the Air
summary: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

name: Boundless Reprisals
summary: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

name: Reflecting Riposte
prerequisite: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
summary: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

name: Sever Space
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

name: Ultimate Flexibility
summary: Your experience keeps you on your toes, helping you adopt complex strategies on the fly and face the most dangerous challenges.

name: Weapon Supremacy
summary: Your skill with weapons bends the laws of reality, allowing you to continuously attack with speed that would normally require magical assistance.
